mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (USERNAME, EMAIL, PASSWORD, BIO, PROFILE_PICTURE, CREATED_AT) VALUES (#{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{bio}, #{profilePicture}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT ID, USERNAME, EMAIL, PASSWORD, BIO, PROFILE_PICTURE, CREATED_AT FROM user WHERE id = #{username} AND password = #{password} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT u.id, u.username, u.email, u.bio, u.profile_picture, -- 게시물 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM photos p WHERE p.user_id = u.id AND p.hide_yn = 'N') AS post_count, -- 팔로워 수 (나를 팔로우 하는 사람 수) (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follows f WHERE f.following_id = u.id) AS follower_count, -- 팔로잉 수 (내가 팔로우 하는 사람 수) (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follows f WHERE f.follower_id = u.id) AS following_count FROM users u WHERE u.id = #{id} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT p.id, p.image_url, p.caption, p.created_at FROM photos p WHERE p.user_id = #{id} AND p.hide_yn = 'N' ORDER BY p.created_at DESC;
SELECT ID, USERNAME, EMAIL, PASSWORD, BIO, PROFILE_PICTURE, CREATED_AT FROM users WHERE USERNAME = #{username} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT ID, USERNAME, EMAIL, PASSWORD, BIO, PROFILE_PICTURE, CREATED_AT FROM users WHERE USERNAME = #{username} AND id != #{id} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT ID, USERNAME, EMAIL, BIO, PROFILE_PICTURE, CREATED_AT FROM users WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT ID, USERNAME, BIO, PROFILE_PICTURE FROM users WHERE USERNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
